casebody.data:
CLEARY BROTHERS, Inc., Libelant-Appellee, v. PENNSYLVANIA RAILROAD COMPANY, Respondent-Appellee, and Edward G. Murray Lighterage & Transportation Company, Respondent-Impleaded-Appellant. No. 226. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 2, 1931. Foley & Martin, of New York City, for appellant Edward G. Murray Lighterage & Transportation Co. John R. McMullen, of New York City, for appellee Cleary Bros., Inc. Burlingham, Yeeder, Fearey, Clark & Hupper, of New York City (Chauneey I. Clark and Norman M. Barron, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee Pennsylvania R. Co.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
